nodes.text: The 6/37th was the sixth starfighter squadron of the 37th Imperial Fighter Wing of the Imperial Navy.

The squadron piloted TIE/LN starfighters and was based aboard the Abrogator. Soontir Fel was assigned to the 6/37th, under Captain Lun Tessra. Zelen also flew as a part of the unit. Just after Fel transferred, the 37th was engaged in combat at Saloch². Fel eventually rose to command the unit.
